txt.en: Instance: A Crack in the Iron Crown
'There is no time to waste! We must press on!'
'Every door in this blasted tower looks exactly the same!'
'Stay in the shadows and keep your head down.'
'Ah-ha! It's just over there, [placeholder].'
'I'll try to get a better look!'
'With mine own hands, I curse thee with a thousand agonies!'
'Worthless! Brathar shall slay you for this, Adder-fang!'
'Why doth thou all stand idle? Aid me, fools!'
'But thy fate was--'
'That's the one! Get them!'
'Over here, [placeholder]!'
'It is time I returned to CÃ¢r Bronach, my friends.'
'Adder-fang wants that one taken alive!'
'Do what you wish with that one, Adder-fang.'
'Finally come out of hiding, eh?'
'Ever since you freed the Longbeards, they've been on edge.'
'They'll be waiting for us this time, but we've got to reach the top of this tower!'
'Come on, [placeholder]!'
'What has become of Angmar?'
'Hah! I'm not one for fair fights either!'
'Follow me and stay quiet! We do not know what awaits us above....'
'Dissenters among the Hill-folk have grown more bold.'
'Farewell, [placeholder].'
'The Orcs have forsaken you to grovel before the son of Bolg.'
'The Iron Crown is cracked, but it will be reforged.'
'Let those dwarves throw themselves against the old gates, my friends.'
'When this war is ended, Gundabad will be ours...'
'...and I will bid them all to kneel once more!'
'Ah. Isn't that so, [placeholder]?'
'Come, join us.'
'I guess that leaves us, Adder-fang!'
'Let's see if you were deserving of mercy, aye?'
'Wretched dwarf! Guile alone will not avail thee!'
'Leave us, servants.'
